Nadia Gamal bụ onye Egypt na-agba egwu na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
A maara ya maka ịgwakọta egwu baldy nke Ijipt na Western Waltz, Cowboy, Cha Cha na ndị ọzọ.
A mụrụ ya dị ka Maria Carydias na Alexandria, Egypt
Gamal malitere ịgba egwú dị ka akụkụ nke ihe nne ya na-eme na cabaret
N'ịbụ onye a zụrụ na piano yana ụdị ịgba egwu dị iche iche dị ka ballet na tap, Gamal malitere ịgba egwu ọdịnala Europe dịka ihe nne ya mere
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ, otu onye na-agba egwú na-arịa ọrịa n'òtù nne ya nyere ya ohere ịgba egwú raqs sharqi na Lebanọn, nke nna ya machibidoro ya ime n'ihi ntorobịa ya
Mgbe nke mbụ a gasịrị, ọ ghọrọ onye na-agba egwú a ma ama ma gaa n'ihu na-eme ihe nkiri n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Ijipt.
N'afọ 1953, ọ lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri India bụ Shammi Kapoor mgbe ha zutere na Sri Lanka, mana ọ laghachiri Cairo
O mekwara ọtụtụ ihe nkiri India.
N'afọ 1968, Gamal ghọrọ onye mbụ na-agba egwu raqs sharqi gbara egwú na Baalbeck International Festival
Ọ pụtakwara na Cairo Opera House ma gbaa egwú maka Eze Hussein na Shah nke Iran
Gamal gara Eshia, Middle East, Europe, Latin America na North America n'oge ọrụ ya
N'afọ 1978 na 1981 ọ kụziri obere oge na-agba egwu na New York City
Ka oge na-aga n'ọrụ ya, Gamal malitere ụlọ akwụkwọ ịgba egwú.
A chọpụtara na Gamal nwere ọrịa kansa ara n'afọ 1990, mgbe ọ na-agwọ ọrịa na Beirut, oyi bara ya n'ahụ
A maara Gamal maka iji ala rụọ ọrụ nke ọma
Ọ na-agụnyekarị raqs baladi (agba egwú ọdịnala), ịgba egwú Bedouin na ịgba egwú Zār na raqs sharqi na arụmọrụ ya.
O nwere mmetụta n'ọtụtụ ndị na-agba egwú dịka Ibrahim Farrah, Suhaila Salimpour, na Claire Naffa.
